info.title: Mary announsed the construction of a child with a game zone on the roof in UAO.
Sobyanin described new trains for the subway and the IDC.
12 new sites were included in the Moscow renovation programme
Synoptics promised Moscow heat on weekends.
In the north of Moscow, a six-storey building was burned.
Mary reported on the launch of the modular housing experiment
Rakov announsed the full supply of mosquitoes free of gluc metres.
Efimov reported new concessions for investors under the urban programme
Vilfand warned of a hololady and freeze in Moscow early this week.
Sobyanin instructed doctors from the regions to have access to Moscow neurosets.
